metadata.name: HAPPY HAPPY MERRY MERRY
metadata.description:
After writing too many emotional & sad Christmas songs I was on a mission to do the exact opposite. This track was so much fun to create and makes me dance and smile, always. I hope itâ€™s gonna cheer you up and make you dance like no ones watching or maybe while someone is ;P 
This NFT gives you access to the Startribe Community, token-gated streams, IRL events and WL spots on future drops and SUPERPOWERS!!! Shine bright. Be your unapologetic self! Stay tuned! 
Much Love and Gratitude!!! 
xXxJVBxXx
